name: Aveliana
storyline:
Welcome, adventurer, to the fantastical world of Aveliana, where danger lurks at every turn, magic flows through the land, and the rewards are great. Get ready to embark on an epic adventure with Aveliana, a fierce and determined protagonist on a quest to find her child, but be warned, nothing is as it seems in this thrilling tale of deception and betrayal.

As you journey through the vast and mysterious world beyond the safety of the city walls, you will encounter intriguing characters, both friend and foe, and navigate through treacherous landscapes. But fear not, for Aveliana is a game that is tailored to your play style, whether you prefer stealth or head-on combat. And with secret paths to explore and unique abilities at your disposal, there is always something new to discover.
summary: Aveliana is an infiltration-action-adventure game in 2.5D with unique and diverse gameplay! Will you stealth your way to victory? Seek a forgotten path on the edge of a cliff? Or stand and fight against your enemies? Follow the trace of a mysterious fox and learn about a surprising story!
